lines.text: [first lines]
I get pampered, I am the center of attention, everyone comes to me.
[first lines]
Every morning I masturbate, uhhh you know a refreshing wake-up.
With a body like this, who wouldn't want to masturbate, what a great way to start the day, its so relaxing, really prepares me for a grueling day at the studio, not to mention the parties of night.
Baron wonderful Baron, I pay him well to do nothing but please me to give me whatever I need or want, whenever I needed or wanted, what a life huh, oh and he also has a pretty good butt.
In my world every day is a new adventure, from morning to night, I am always on the stage.

When I make love in a scene for a movie its completely different because there's another person there and if your partner turns you on, then its really hot, its kind of wild, you got to control your feelings, your sexual feelings and everything has to look natural so real, you got to play with your emotions and play with your partner at the same time, it can be a really powerful moment.
I think every woman has a fantasy of another woman, I just have a fantasy about a maid.
[laughs]
My favorite place to masturbate? Definitely the tub.
Jason he's my chef, he feeds me all sorts of good things, I love strawberrys with his hands especially when he teases me with them.
Wow, I just get so exotic.

[after anna fantasizes her doing sex with her chef]
Hey Smith...
Yes!
Your limousine is ready Mrs. Smith.
I'll be right there sweetheart!

[laughing briefly]
Wow...
I have always wanted to do a vargas calendar.

[referring to the background music in the photoshoot scene, passionately saying]
This music really hypes me and it gets me... you know, going and...

When it was explained to me about the casting couch and there was a great great scene, a scene for me to turn the tables and for me to be the producer and have all these men, I walked in with just a jacket and panties and real dominant, saw I liked and saw what I didn't liked and chose one I did like.

[scene where Anna as a producer and actress interviewing an individual Morgan for a role in the movie]
What kind of performance you do?

[saying nervously]
Anything!

[saying sensually]
Anything... what about a scene... I don't know 22?
The love scene?
Yes!
Well I was thinking that a you know it might just something requires little more of my skills, you mean the part where I holding my arms and kiss you?

[saying sensually]
This part!

[after didn't like the kiss with morgan]
Sorry, next...

[Anna doing commentary in the background when Anna fantasizing her doing sex with her chauffeur]
Morgan is my chauffeur officially but more importantly he's my friend, he protects me from harm when I am out on the town and he's always there for me when I need him, Morgan is always joking, he can make me laugh like no one else, there's nothing like being with a man who can make you laugh, he can make me feel good inside when no one else can, with all this senseless attention I get I just don't know what I do without him, never had a sexual fantasy about Morgan... well, except just this ones.
People use to consider me as a... I guess you could say the little girl... next door.
I just, I don't know, I kinda want to show people another side that I am.
